name: The Waifu Game
description:
Have fun with this puzzle game where you'll have to match different Waifus falling onto the board to evolve into new forms and reach the ultimate Waifu. Completing each board will grant you access to new photos in the gallery. Will you be able to complete them all?

Game modes:
  • Normal:Complete game boards to gradually unlock the gallery.
  • Endless: A game mode where the sole objective is to achieve the highest number of points.
  • NSFW: Access the uncensored mode of the previous two (Includes gallery).
